original_text: As he came from his mother's womb he shall go again, naked as he came, and shall take nothing for his toil that he may carry away in his hand.
korean_text: 그가 모태에서 벌거벗고 나왔은즉 그가 나온 대로 돌아가고 수고하여 얻은 것을 아무것도 자기 손에 가지고 가지 못하리니

sentences.original_text: As he came from his mother's womb
and shall take nothing for his toil
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 수고한 것에 대해 아무것도 가져가지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: that he may carry away in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 손에 들고 갈 수 있는 것
